name: Starfighter Visual Novel
blurb: Creating a visual novel based on the webcomic Starfighter!

rewards.reward: Access to the Starfighter visual novel game, what this is all about!
Access to the game plus a heartfelt thank you on the website! In addition, a Kickstarter backer badge for your Date Nighto profile!

You get beta access! (This means you\u2019ll get access to the game as it\u2019s nearing completion) With the beta access, of course you get a beta badge on your Date Nighto profile (in addition to the Kickstarter badge), access to the game, and a thank you on the website and in credits!

You\u2019ll get Starfighter: Chapter 3 with a Kickstarter exclusive foil cover -- this is a version of Chapter 3 only available through the Kickstarter -- plus the Starfighter visual novel digital art book, official soundtrack, and beta access! Plus, a thank you in the credits and website!\r\n\r\n***The Chapter 3 with a Kickstarter exclusive foil cover is only available to backers and will be released at approximately the same time as the regular version of Chapter 3 through the Starfighter online shop! You don\u2019t have to back the Kickstarter to get Chapter 3!***

(I love this one- because it has a t-shirt and I love t-shirts) So of course, you get the exclusive Kickstarter shirt (which is practically like me hugging you), an exclusive Kickstarter print, the special Chapter 3 with Kickstarter exclusive foil cover, the digital art book, soundtrack, beta access, and Date Nighto profile badges! Plus, a thank you in the credits and website! Whew!\r\n\r\n***SHIPMENT NOTE: The visual novel will ship out in Spring 2015 but all physical goods will be sent out as soon as we have them!

Starfighter Eclipse Complete Pack: ============================= All three Starfighter books with the special Kickstarter exclusive foil covers, the exclusive Kickstarter shirt, an exclusive Kickstarter print, the digital art book, soundtrack, beta access, and Date Nighto profile badges! Plus, a thank you in the credits and website!\r\n\r\n***SHIPMENT NOTE: The visual novel will ship out in Spring 2015 but all physical goods will be sent out as soon as we have them!

HERE IS THE BEST PART: You get an invitation to the launch party in NYC! Come hang out with me, Date Nighto, and the creative team! IT WILL BE AMAZING! (Invite only, travel and accommodations not included) You\u2019ll also get special thanks in the game credits, plus all the rewards from the Starfighter Eclipse Complete Pack!\r\n\r\n***SHIPMENT NOTE: The visual novel will ship out in Spring 2015 but all physical goods will be sent out as soon as we have them!

Your name will appear somewhere in the game! Of course, this comes with the special invitation to the launch party in NYC, special thanks in the game credits, and ALL the rewards from the Starfighter Eclipse Complete Pack!\r\n\r\n***SHIPMENT NOTE: The visual novel will ship out in Spring 2015 but all physical goods will be sent out as soon as we have them!

Commission time! This is kind of rare for me since I don\u2019t normally take commissions- so if you have ever wanted a personal drawing PLUS a ton of treats and to help support the game, PLUS my sincere gratitude and thanks, this is for you! I\u2019ll be doing single character commission of a Starfighter character of your choosing! In addition to the launch party invitation, special thanks in the game credits, and ALL the rewards from the Starfighter Eclipse Complete Pack!\r\n\r\n***SHIPMENT NOTE: The visual novel will ship out in Spring 2015 but all physical goods will be sent out as soon as we have them!

Name a character! That\u2019s right -- ever wanted a Fighter or Navigator to be given the name of your choosing? This is your chance! PLUS THE COMMISSION! In addition to the launch party invitation (Oh my gosh, let me buy you a drink), special thanks in the game credits, and ALL the rewards from the Starfighter Eclipse Complete Pack! Also, wow.\r\n\r\n***SHIPMENT NOTE: The visual novel will ship out in Spring 2015 but all physical goods will be sent out as soon as we have them!

You can help design a Starfighter Fighter and Navigator that appear in the game: oh yes, this is real. They\u2019ll actually appear in the game! Everyone will see them. WHO WILL KNOW? What will their task names be?! (The designs have to fall within certain aesthetic guidelines of the comic, like they have to be human, etc- leave that to me!) PLUS the commission!  In addition to the launch party invitation, special thanks in the game credits, and ALL the rewards from the Starfighter Eclipse Complete Pack!\r\n\r\n***SHIPMENT NOTE: The visual novel will ship out in Spring 2015 but all physical goods will be sent out as soon as we have them!

COMMANDER TIER. You will have an executive producer credit in the game! PLUS the commission! In addition to the launch party invitation, special thanks in the game credits, and ALL the rewards from the Starfighter Eclipse Complete Pack! Also, oh wow, this is amazing.\r\n\r\n***SHIPMENT NOTE: The visual novel will ship out in Spring 2015 but all physical goods will be sent out as soon as we have them!
